trans-unit.source: Represents a control that provides a scroll bar that has a sliding <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> whose position corresponds to a value.
trans-unit.target: 表示提供滚动条具有一个滑动的控件<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>其位置对应于一个值。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a ScrollBar control.
trans-unit.target: 下图显示滚动条控件。

trans-unit.source: ![Scrollbar illustration](~/add/media/scrollbar-illustration.JPG "Scrollbar illustration") The ScrollBar control contains a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control.
trans-unit.target: ![Scrollbar 图](~/add/media/scrollbar-illustration.JPG "Scrollbar 图")滚动条控件包含<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control consists of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control and two <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>控件包含<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>控件和两个<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: You can increase and decrease the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> property of the ScrollBar control by pressing the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls or by moving the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以增加和减少<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>按滚动条控件属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>控件或通过移动<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default range of values for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> property is from 0 to 1.
trans-unit.target: 值的默认范围<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>属性是从 0 到 1。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> represents the linear distance of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> between the endpoints of the ScrollBar.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>表示的线性距离<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>滚动条在终结点之间。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can change the default range of values by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过设置更改的值的默认范围<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A> property determines whether the ScrollBar is displayed horizontally or vertically, and you must define this property for the ScrollBar control to appear.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A>属性确定是否滚动条将显示水平或垂直，并且必须定义要显示的滚动条控件的此属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> in a ScrollBar is oriented so that values increase from top to bottom for a vertical ScrollBar or from left to right for a horizontal ScrollBar.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>在滚动条是面向，以便值增加从上到下垂直滚动条或从左到右水平滚动条。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> properties in the following table are the binding targets for the corresponding ScrollBar properties when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A> property is not explicitly defined.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>下表中的属性是为相应的滚动条属性的绑定目标时<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A>属性未显式定义。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: If you explicitly define the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A> property, the binding does not occur.
trans-unit.target: 如果显式定义<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A>属性，该绑定不会发生。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A>

trans-unit.source: |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> property|ScrollBar property| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| You can access the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control of a ScrollBar control by using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>属性 |滚动条属性 | |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| 你可以访问<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>滚动条控件通过使用控件<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: To display <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> content inside a box that has scroll bars, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要显示<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>具有滚动条的内容框中，使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: Customizing the ScrollBar Control To apply the same property settings to multiple ScrollBar controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 自定义滚动条控件到适用于多个滚动条控件，使用的相同的属性设置<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 你可以修改默认<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>提供独特外观的控制。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the ScrollBar, see [ScrollBar Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要查看的部件和特定于滚动条的状态，请参阅[滚动条样式和模板](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 对于此控件的依赖项属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果属性设置的默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值，如果控件出现在应用程序中。

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 桌面主题用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in ScrollBar control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 设置 visual 属性仅会产生作用如果该属性既存在滚动条控件的默认模板中，通过设置。

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: 可以在的"更改 Visual 结构的控件"一节中找到的可视属性列表[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of the scrollable content that is currently visible.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当前可见的可滚动的内容量。

trans-unit.source: The units that are used for ViewportSize are the same units that are used to describe the length of the content.
trans-unit.target: 用于 ViewportSize 单位为相同的单位，用于描述的内容的长度。

trans-unit.source: Some examples include lines of text or pages of text.
trans-unit.target: 一些示例包括的文本行或页的文本。

trans-unit.source: The value of the ViewportSize property is used to calculate the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control that is displayed as the sliding value indicator in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control.
trans-unit.target: ViewportSize 属性的值用于计算的大小<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>控件显示为的滑动值指示器<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control's size represents the amount of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control's content that is visible.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>控件的大小表示量<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>是可见的控件的内容。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: If 25 percent of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control's content is visible, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> occupies 25 percent of the track in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.
trans-unit.target: 如果 25%<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>控件的内容是可见的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>占用处于<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>轨道的 25%</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: You can decide which units ViewportSize uses.
trans-unit.target: 你可以决定哪些单位 ViewportSize 使用。

trans-unit.source: When you set this property, make sure that the ViewportSize, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> properties use the same units.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性时，请确保 ViewportSize， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>属性使用相同的单位。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>
